I tried the excluded.properties file but still get a 
 javax.naming.NoInitialContextException


So, my tests run fine with -noloading, but excluding like this in a
junit/util/excluded.properties:

...
excluded.12=com.update.redrock.util.*
excluded.13=com.update.redrock.ecm.*
excluded.14=com.update.redrock.ecm.campaign.*

leads to the old problem (same as not using the -noloading).
(Classes under test are in com.update.redrock.ecm.campaign)

I put the file in K:\redrock\dev\classes\junit\util\excluded.properties.

JBuilder tells me that K:\redrock\dev\classes is on the classpath:

J:\ide\JBuilder4\jdk1.3\bin\javaw -classic -classpath
"K:\redrock\dev\classes;


What else could be wrong?

Thank you a lot,

  Lucas
subject: excluded.properties, location ?
